results.title: The Protective Effect of Metformin on Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ alleviated both annual expansion rate and @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm_Ruptured</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017542 @@@aneurysm rupture@@@ frequency in @DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@.

results.title: Metformin treatment does not affect the risk of ruptured abdominal aortic aneurysms.
results.text_hl: Consequently, we hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment may reverse the protective role of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ on the development and course of @DISEASE_Aneurysm @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysms@@@, that is, that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ would be associated with @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm_Ruptured</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017542 @@@aneurysm rupture@@@ among individuals with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Kristensen KL, Pottegård A, Hallas J, Rasmussen LM, Lindholt JS. Metformin treatment does not affect the risk of ruptured abdominal aortic aneurysms. J Vasc Surg. 2017 Sep;66(3):768-774.e2. PMID: 28506478
